citation.title: Solution structure of the CH domain and the SH3 domain in RAC/CDC42 guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF) 6.

comment.text: Acts as a RAC1 guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF).

Interacts with PAK kinases through the SH3 domain. Interacts with GIT1. Component of cytoplasmic complexes, which also contain PXN, GIT1 and PAK1 (By similarity). Interacts with PARVB. Interacts with BIN2. Identified in a complex with BIN2 and GIT2.

property.value: Regulation of cytoskeletal remodeling and cell spreading by IPP complex components
Expressed in adipose tissue and 243 other tissues
P:regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction
